name: Woodstock Nordic Center
description: Discover over 45km of terrain for cross-country skiing and snowshoeing across two mountainous trail networks in the heart of Woodstock, Vermont. Explore historic carriage trails in Vermonts only National Park (the Marsh-Billings-Rockfeller National Historical Park) on Mt. Tom and cruise the varying terrain on Mt. Peg ranging from casual ski-tours to technical tracks. Enjoy the extensive network of winter trails leading to panoramic views of the village and valley below. Cross-country ski and snowshoe rentals, winter clothing, accessories, and trail passes are all available at the Woodstock Nordic Center lodge at the base of Mt. Peg.
